headline: PYPL, DJT, MU And More: 5 Stocks Investors Couldn't Stop Buzzing About This Week
summary: Retail investors talked up five hot stocks this week (Dec. 15 to Dec. 19) on X and Reddit's r/WallStreetBets, driven by earnings, retail hype, AI buzz, and corporate news flow. The stocks, PayPal Holdings Inc. (NASDAQ:PYPL), Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. (NASDAQ:DJT), Micron Technology Inc. (NASDAQ:MU), Rivian Automotive Inc. (NASDAQ:RIVN), and Nike Inc. (NYSE:NKE), spanning finance, crypto, semiconductors, AI, automotive, and sports, reflected diverse retail interests. Don't Miss: If the
